# Set up the configuration for accessing the storage account
storage_account_name = "ds598anthonyhuangstorage"
storage_account_key = ""

spark.conf.set(
    "fs.azure.account.key." + storage_account_name + ".dfs.core.windows.net",
    storage_account_key
)

# Read data directly from ADLS Gen2
container_name = "ds598anthonyhuangblobcontainer"
air_pollution_folder_path = "bronze/data/2.5/air_pollution"  # Folder, not a single file
historical_weather_folder_path = "bronze/historical_weather"

# Read all JSON files in the folder
air_pollution_df = spark.read.json(f"abfss://{container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/{air_pollution_folder_path}")
historical_weather_df = spark.read.json(f"abfss://{container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/{historical_weather_folder_path}")
# Show the DataFrame

from pyspark.sql.functions import col, explode

air_pollution = air_pollution_df.select(
    col("coord.lat").alias("latitude"),
    col("coord.lon").alias("longitude"),
    explode(col("list")).alias("list_element")
).select(
    col("latitude"),
    col("longitude"),
    col("list_element.dt").alias("timestamp"),
    col("list_element.main.aqi").alias("aqi"),
    col("list_element.components.co").alias("carbon_monoxide"),
    col("list_element.components.no").alias("nitric_oxide"),
    col("list_element.components.no2").alias("nitrogen_dioxide"),
    col("list_element.components.o3").alias("ozone"),
    col("list_element.components.so2").alias("sulfur_dioxide"),
    col("list_element.components.pm2_5").alias("pm2_5"),
    col("list_element.components.pm10").alias("pm10"),
    col("list_element.components.nh3").alias("ammonia")
)

air_pollution = air_pollution.toPandas()
air_pollution.head()

historical_weather = historical_weather_df.select(
    explode(col("list")).alias("list_element")
).select(
    col("list_element.dt").alias("timestamp"),
    col("list_element.main.temp").alias("temperature"),
    col("list_element.main.feels_like").alias("feels_like_temp"),
    col("list_element.main.temp_max").alias("max_temperature"),
    col("list_element.main.temp_min").alias("min_temperature"),
    col("list_element.main.humidity").alias("humidity"),
    col("list_element.main.pressure").alias("pressure"),
    col("list_element.wind.speed").alias("wind_speed"),
    col("list_element.wind.deg").alias("wind_direction"),
    col("list_element.wind.gust").alias("wind_gust"),
    col("list_element.clouds.all").alias("cloud_cover"),
    col("list_element.rain.1h").alias("rain_1h"),
    col("list_element.rain.3h").alias("rain_3h"),
    col("list_element.snow.1h").alias("snow_1h"),
    explode(col("list_element.weather")).alias("weather_element")
).select(
    col("timestamp"),
    col("temperature"),
    col("feels_like_temp"),
    col("max_temperature"),
    col("min_temperature"),
    col("humidity"),
    col("pressure"),
    col("wind_speed"),
    col("wind_direction"),
    col("wind_gust"),
    col("cloud_cover"),
    col("rain_1h"),
    col("rain_3h"),
    col("snow_1h"),
    col("weather_element.description").alias("weather_description")
)
historical_weather = historical_weather.toPandas()
historical_weather.head()
